Use

HTML 

<rg-include></rg-include>

JavaScript 

var tags = riot.mount('rg-include', {
  include: {
    url: 'demo_text.html',
    unsafe: true
  }
})

tags[0].on('loading', function () { ... })
tags[0].on('loaded', function () { ... })

The component will then request the file at the specified url path and insert the contents into the page.
